thread.title: Twitter reacts to Lady Gaga's Super Bowl LI halftime performance
thread.title_full: Twitter reacts to Lady Gaga's Super Bowl LI halftime performance

author: Shutdown Corner
title: Twitter reacts to Lady Gaga's Super Bowl LI halftime performance
text:
(Getty) More Following a half of action between the Falcons and the Patriots, Lady Gaga got the chance to shine with her Super Bowl halftime performance.
Twitter users everywhere reacted to the elaborate performance, which started with Gaga performing on the roof of NRG stadium and ended with her catching a football and dropping the mic.
GAGA IS BATMAN
— KOBE BUFFALOMEAT (@edsbs) February 6, 2017
how do football players get to stretch a 15 minute quarter into an hour & a half but gaga's 13 minutes only last 13 minutes #PepsiHalftime
— Tyler Oakley (@tyleroakley) February 6, 2017
Lady Gaga has bounce lol
— Jeremy Lin (@JLin7) February 6, 2017
. @ladygaga You will never be Spider-man. Stop it.
— BEEZ (@bugattibeez) February 6, 2017
I wish I trusted anyone as much as @ladygaga trusts those suspension cables helping her fly through the air.
— Ben Schwartz (@rejectedjokes) February 6, 2017
It's Lady Gaga!!! #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/wbOmSTrQcT
— Jason Jennings (@_jasonjennings) February 6, 2017
Totally forgot how many Lady Gaga songs I actually know
— Frank Kaminsky III (@FSKPart3) February 6, 2017
I can't even brush my hair every day and #LadyGaga just changed hairstyles while flying through the air at the #SuperBowl . #PepsiHalftime .
— Kristin Klingshirn (@KrisKling) February 6, 2017
Yeaaaahh get it @ladygaga
— SKRILLEX (@Skrillex) February 6, 2017
Wonder why @ladygaga decided to do an unfunny version of my song?
— Al Yankovic (@alyankovic) February 6, 2017
that was fun. But still the greatest…. pic.twitter.com/T3LEN1OQ2q
— Candace Buckner (@CandaceDBuckner) February 6, 2017
Okay, @ladygaga just killing the Half Time Show stealing the show!
— Mark Ruffalo (@MarkRuffalo) February 6, 2017
Lady Gaga dropped the mic and then jumped into the 5th dimension.
— Jemele Hill (@jemelehill) February 6, 2017
Me jumping to conclusions pic.twitter.com/UqfH50U4WX
— Funny Vines (@FunnyVines) February 6, 2017
Wow @ladygaga killed the halftime show. Well done #Superbowl
— Nick Jonas (@nickjonas) February 6, 2017
Wish the Patriots' offense had been able to get off the ground the way Gaga did. What an aerial display, unlike Brady's. She was good.
— Skip Bayless (@RealSkipBayless) February 6, 2017
I didn't realize I knew any of @ladygaga music. I'm now a GAGA fan!!! You did that!
— DWade (@DwyaneWade) February 6, 2017
